CustomField.description: This field is created for Report - [SFD000252 - Technician Unavailable Report]
CustomField.formula: OR (AND(Actual_Service_Date__c >= X2nd_Technician__r.Start_Date__c , Actual_Service_Date__c <= X2nd_Technician__r.End_Date__c ),AND( Actual_Service_Date__c >= Engineer2__r.Start_Date__c , Actual_Service_Date__c <= Engineer2__r.End_Date__c ))
CustomField.label: Technician Unavailable Check
